metadata.title: CVE-2021-3286 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection exists in Spotweb 1.4.9 because the notAllowedCommandsprotection mechanism is inadequate, e.g., a variation of the payload may beused. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2020-35545.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3286` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spotweb - 20130826+dfsg3-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spotweb package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20130826+dfsg3-4').
